text: Steffi Menning (born 2 January 1971) is a German former professional tennis player. Menning, who was born in Oberstdorf, was an Orange Bowl doubles finalist in 1987 and won the 1988 German National Indoor Championships. On the professional tour, she reached a best singles ranking of 188 in the world. She qualified for the main draw of the 1990 Australian Open and was beaten in the first round by Audra Keller, in three sets. ==ITF finals== ===Singles (1–0)=== {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:85%" |- !Legend |- style="background:#f0f8ff;" |$10,000 tournaments |} {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:85%" |- !Outcome !No. !Date !Tournament !Surface !Opponent !Score |-style="background:#f0f8ff;" | style="background:#98fb98;"|Winner | 1. | 8 February 1988 | Stavanger, Norway | Carpet | Maria Strandlund | 6–4, 6–7, 6–4 |} ===Doubles (1–0)=== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:85%" |- !Outcome !No. !Date !Tournament !Surface !Partner !Opponents !Score |-style="background:#f0f8ff;" | style="background:#98fb98;"|Winner | 1. | 7 January 1991 | Bamberg, Germany | Carpet | Martina Pawlik | Sabine Auer Heike Thoms | 6–4, 6–7, 6–3 |} ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:West German female tennis players Category:German female tennis players Category:People from Oberstdorf
